isVisible

public static boolean isVisible(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode n)
Method for analyzing CSS presentation semantics encoded within a DOM node and determining whether it is currently visible to a user. Recursively checks if CSS is hiding the context node or any ancestor

Parameters:
n - Node for determining if hidden or not
Returns:
true if Node n is currently in the presentation view, false otherwise

nodeSatisfiesAxis

public static boolean nodeSatisfiesAxis(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode newContext,
                                        AdditionalAxisNavigator aan)
static method that tests whether a node satisfies the conditions set by an additional axis (node name and attributes)

Parameters:
newContext - node to compare
aan - Additional Axis Navigator
Returns:
true if newContent satisfies the conditions of aan, false otherwise

hasAttribute

public boolean hasAttribute()
method for determining if the last action this object executed has an attribute

Returns:
true if this object has executed an action with an attribute, false otherwise

getLastAttributeName

public java.lang.String getLastAttributeName()
method for getting the attribute name of the last action this object executed

Returns:
name of attribute of last action this object executed, empty String if action had no attribute

getLastAttributeValue
